## Problem

What problem are you trying to solve?

## Proposed solution

Describe the solution you'd like to see.

## Alternatives

Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Scope check

Is this for Next.js App Router? If not, please note that framework support is roadmap-only unless contributor-led.
